mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM , a.* FROM( SELECT A.PST_NO ,A.USER_ID ,A.CO_ID ,A.DELR_NM ,A.MDFR_NM ,A.PST_HD ,A.PST_TTL ,A.PST_CN ,A.REG_DT ,A.MDFCN_DT ,A.INQ_CNT ,A.BBS_CLSF ,A.TEMP_YN ,A.DEL_YN ,A.DEL_DT ,B.USER_NM ,F.CST_CD_NM AS header_as_kor FROM BBS A INNER JOIN USERS B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.BBS_CLSF = 'BB001' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN CUSTOME_CODE F ON a.PST_HD = F.CST_CD ORDER BY PST_NO) A ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC

SELECT A.PST_NO , A.USER_ID , A.CO_ID , A.DELR_NM , A.MDFR_NM , A.PST_HD , F.CST_CD_NM AS HEADER_AS_KOR , A.PST_TTL , A.PST_CN , A.REG_DT , A.MDFCN_DT , A.INQ_CNT , A.BBS_CLSF , A.TEMP_YN , A.DEL_YN , A.DEL_DT , B.BBS_FL_NO , B.FILE_NM , B.FILE_UUID , B.FILE_PATH , B.FILE_EXTN , B.FILE_SIZE , B.PST_NO , C.USER_NM , D.JBGD_CD , E.CST_CD_NM AS CST_CD_NM , B.FILE_EXIST
FROM BBS A
LEFT JOIN BBS_ATCH B ON A.PST_NO = B.PST_NO
INNER JOIN USERS C ON A.USER_ID = C.USER_ID
INNER JOIN EMP_INFO D ON A.USER_ID = D.USER_ID
INNER JOIN CUSTOME_CODE E ON D.JBGD_CD = E.CST_CD
INNER JOIN CUSTOME_CODE F ON A.PST_HD = F.CST_CD
WHERE A.PST_NO = #{pstNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE BBS SET INQ_CNT = INQ_CNT + 1 WHERE PST_NO = #{PSTNO}
mapper.select: SELECT CST_CD, CO_ID, GR_CD, CST_CD_NM, USER_ID, REG_DT, USE_YN FROM CUSTOME_CODE WHERE GR_CD = #{grCd}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT pst_no, FN_GET_CST_CD_NM(pst_hd) AS headers, pst_ttl, reg_dt FROM bbs WHERE bbs_clsf = 'BB001' AND del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY reg_dt DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
